required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Single and Repeated Dose Escalation of RBD1016 in Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis B Virus (HBV) Infection
clinical_study.official_title: A Single and Repeated Dose Escalation, Phase I Clinical Study to Evaluate the Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Preliminary Pharmacodynamics of RBD1016 in Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis B Virus (HBV) Infection

lead_sponsor.agency: Suzhou Ribo Life Science Co. Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Suzhou Ribo Life Science Co. Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, single (Part A) and repeated dose (Part B) escalation, phase I clinical study to evaluate the safety, pharmacokinetics (PK) and preliminary pharmacodynamics (PD) of RBD1016 in subjects with chronic HBV infection.

detailed_description.textblock: The study consists of two parts. Part A is the single dose escalation study where subjects with chronic HBV infection will be assigned to receive single dose of RBD1016 or placebo . Part B is the multiple dose escalation study where subjects with chronic HBV infection will be assigned to receive two doses of RBD1016 or placebo.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Adverse events (AEs) and serious adverse events (SAEs) within 28 days after treatment (Part A)
primary_outcome.description: All reported AE terms will be coded using Medical Dictionary for Drug Regulatory Affairs (MedDRA).AEs and SAEs occurred throughout the course of the study will be evaluated and graded based on NCI-CTCAE V5.0.

primary_outcome.measure: Adverse events (AEs) and serious adverse events (SAEs) within 28 days after the last treatment(Part B)
primary_outcome.description: All reported AE terms will be coded using Medical Dictionary for Drug Regulatory Affairs (MedDRA).AEs and SAEs occurred throughout the course of the study will be evaluated and graded based on NCI-CTCAE V5.0.

secondary_outcome.measure: To draw the figure of HBsAg dynamic changes from baseline to Week 24 (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: Electro chmiluminescence method will be used to detect hepatitis B surface antigen (HBsAg).

secondary_outcome.measure: To draw the figure of HBsAb dynamic changes from baseline to Week 24 (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: Electro chmiluminescence method will be used to detect hepatitis B surface antibody (HBsAb).

secondary_outcome.measure: To draw the figure of HBeAg dynamic changes from baseline to Week 24 (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: Electro chmiluminescence method will be used to detect hepatitis B e antigen (HBeAg).

secondary_outcome.measure: To draw the figure of HBeAb dynamic changes from baseline to Week 24 (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: Electro chmiluminescence method will be used to detect hepatitis B e antibody (HBeAb).

secondary_outcome.measure: To draw the figure of HBcAb dynamic changes from baseline to Week 24 (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: Electro chmiluminescence method will be used to detect hepatitis B core antibody (HBcAb).

secondary_outcome.measure: To draw the figure of HBcrAg dynamic changes from baseline to Week 24 (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: Electro chmiluminescence method will be used to detect hepatitis B core-related antigen (HBcrAg).

secondary_outcome.measure: To draw the figure of HBV DNA dynamic changes from baseline to Week 24 (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: PCR will be used to detect HBV DNA.

secondary_outcome.measure: To draw the figure of HBV RNA dynamic changes from baseline to Week 24 (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: PCR will be used to detect HBV RNA.

secondary_outcome.measure: To draw the figure of peripheral blood T lymphocyte subsets dynamic changes from baseline to Week 24 (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: Flow Cytometry will be used to detect peripheral blood T lymphocyte subsets.

secondary_outcome.measure: To draw the figure of B cell dynamic changes from baseline to Week 24 (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: Flow Cytometry will be used to detect B cell count.

secondary_outcome.measure: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameter Cmax (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: PCR will be ued to detect Maximum concentration (Cmax) and PhoenixWinNonlin software (V8.0 or higher) will be used to calculate the PK parameters.

secondary_outcome.measure: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameter Tmax (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: Time to maximum concentration (Tmax) will be calculated by PhoenixWinNonlin software (V8.0 or higher) will be used to calculate the PK parameter.

secondary_outcome.measure: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameter AUC0-t (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve from 0 to the collection time t (AUC0-t) will be calculated by PhoenixWinNonlin software (V8.0 or higher).

secondary_outcome.measure: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameter AUC0-inf (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve from 0 to infinity (AUC0-inf) will be calculated by PhoenixWinNonlin software (V8.0 or higher).

secondary_outcome.measure: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameter t1/2 (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: Half-Life (t1/2) will be calculated by PhoenixWinNonlin software (V8.0 or higher).

secondary_outcome.measure: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameter Vd (Part A).
secondary_outcome.description: Apparent volume of distribution (Vd) will be calculated by PhoenixWinNonlin software (V8.0 or higher).

secondary_outcome.measure: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameter CL/F (Part A)
secondary_outcome.description: Clearance (CL/F) will be calculated by PhoenixWinNonlin software (V8.0 or higher).

secondary_outcome.measure: To draw the figure of HBsAg dynamic changes from baseline to Week 24 (Part B).
secondary_outcome.description: Electro chmiluminescence method will be used to detect hepatitis B surface antigen (HBsAg).

secondary_outcome.measure: To draw the figure of HBsAb dynamic changes from baseline to Week 24 (Part B).
secondary_outcome.description: Electro chmiluminescence method will be used to detect hepatitis B surface antibody (HBsAb).

secondary_outcome.description: PCR will be ued to detect Maximum concentration (Cmax) and PhoenixWinNonlin software (V8.0 or higher) will be used to calculate the PK parameters.

secondary_outcome.description: Time to maximum concentration (Tmax) will be calculated by PhoenixWinNonlin software (V8.0 or higher) will be used to calculate the PK parameter.

secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve from 0 to the collection time t (AUC0-t) will be calculated by PhoenixWinNonlin software (V8.0 or higher).

secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve from 0 to infinity (AUC0-inf) will be calculated by PhoenixWinNonlin software (V8.0 or higher).

secondary_outcome.measure: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameter t1/2 (Part B).
secondary_outcome.description: Half-Life (t1/2) will be calculated by PhoenixWinNonlin software (V8.0 or higher).

secondary_outcome.measure: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameter Vd (Part B).
secondary_outcome.description: Apparent volume of distribution (Vd) will be calculated by PhoenixWinNonlin software (V8.0 or higher).

arm_group.description: Subjects will receive single dose RBD1016/placebo on D1 combined with antiviral drugs during the study period.
Subjects will receive two doses of RBD1016/placebo on D1 and D29 combined with antiviral drugs during the study period.
